channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gold Futures Slide to One-Month Lows on Higher U.S. Dollar, Bond Yields
item.description: Gold slumped to one-month lows amid a stronger dollar and rising U.S. bond yields.

item.title: Shoe Brands' Secret to Success? Going Slow
item.description: Trendy shoe brands such as Hoka, On and Birkenstock are taking a page out of luxury’s playbook.

item.title: Tesla’s stock extends election surge, as Elon Musk is getting $68 billion richer
item.description: Tesla’s stock is headed for its best four-day stretch in more than four years, following Donald Trump’s election win.

item.title: What a second Trump term means for car prices and electric vehicles

item.title: Bristol Myers Squibb’s stock soars after rival AbbVie reports disappointing schizophrenia-drug trial
item.description: Bristol Myers Squibb Co. shares surged 12.5% Monday after rival AbbVie Inc. reported disappointing results from the trial of a new schizophrenia drug.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Rise as Bitcoin Hits New Record
item.description: U.S. stocks rose, with the S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow all higher after closing at records Friday. Meanwhile, bitcoin prices were surging above $82,000.
